name: Space Shooter Adventure 2018
description:
Get yourself in the extreme space shooting war with alien ships and assure your survival if you want to play and simulate sky shooting and space war for glory and duty of survival for your planet then Galaxy War: Space Shooter Adventure 2018 is best to space warship game for you.Different Spaceships and aircraft are coming to throw you in hell within this shooter game. Face an increasingly large number of destructive projectiles and aircraft enemies. Shoot and take down the enemies and earn the scores to upgrade your spacecraft to and get the full lethal capacity to destroy the alien war in the galaxy.

Games Features:
* High-quality images optimized for tablets and large screens.
* Ability to use active skills during the space battles.
* The game is packed with endless levels of various difficulties.
* Beautiful levels with immersive missions to complete.
* Multiple extreme boss battles.
